title: Type recommendation for Logo
content:
Hello-

I'm looking to find a type face the works well with this logo. Right now I've just thrown garamond on there. I'm looking for something a bit more edgey, but still carries a sophisticated stance. I've been searching forever and just cant seem find anything that complements it well. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thanks a bunch!.

-one8e

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [VR.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085609/http:/typophile.com/files/VR.jpg) | 27.77 KB |
author: one8e

comments.content:
prehaps the sophisticated sturdiness of News Plantin might do the trick.
